text: Smoothie with goji berries Place a tablespoon of goji berries, some banana slices, a few strawberries or any other fruit, and 200 ml of kefir or yogurt into a blender.  Whisk to blend.  Pour into tall glasses. Garnish with a sprig of mint smoothie, a slice of lemon. Serve. This makes for a delicious, nutritious and healthy breakfast, plus a boost of energy for the whole day. You can add ice cubes. Tea with goji berries Make a tea or infusion with goji berries. Place 1 tablespoon of goji berries fruit in a thermos or conventional teapot. Pour boiling water over the top. Let sit for half hour. Pour into a cup for serving. You do not need to throw away the used berries, they can be eaten softened from the thermos, or added to oatmeal. Refreshing mocktail with goji berries Try a mocktail with goji berries. Place mint leaves, half a tablespoon of goji berries, 2 peeled kiwifruits (sliced), the orange segments from one orange and grapefruit juice into the blender. Mix well in the blender.  Serve. Add ice and a healthy drink is ready. Salad with goji berries Place 3 tablespoons of goji berries, 2 apples (diced), 3 cups of walnut halves, some pine nuts and sunflower seeds into a mixing bowl. Cut the apples into small cubes. Mix all ingredients together.  Sprinkle over fruit or vegetable salad.
